lead_paragraph: FARANS--Alvin, of Westport, passed away peacefully on Wednesday evening, April 6, 2016, surrounded by his family. Born January 22, 1928, in Norwalk, CT, he was the son of the late William and Mildred Farans. He was a loving father and grandfather, devoted to his family, and will be dearly missed. Alvin is survived by his daughters, Danielle Finke and Claudia Morse, and his grandchildren Alexander, Emily, and Matthew Morse and Kiley and Keira Finke. Services will be held at Temple Shalom, 259 Richards Avenue in Norwalk, CT., on Sunday, April 10th, at 12pm. In lieu of flowers, donations in his memory may be made to Regional Hospice and Home Care Center of Western Connecticut: (regionalhospicect.org) and the American Lung Association (www.lung.org). 1/3
